vsParam:
Check it out! 10 limited apple bread!
I rushed to the shop in the Academy and bought them.

Wow, I heard that this bread is very hard to buy!
Amazing! Marie, you are so amazing!
Looks like you have gotten used to the Academy life.
I want one, I want one!

Certainly. After all, I am a student,
and everyone here treats me so well.

Yeah, sure! I think I have fully adapted myself
to the Academy in this world.

Yeah, you are right.
It feels like that Marie has always been a student here.

I am a student, and everyone here treats me well.
It's not hard for me to adapt to the new environment.

However, although they are all Academies,
the one in Salburg is different from this one here at Bressisle.

Salburg Academy has more equipment and facilities while
Bressisle Academy has more exquisite internal decoration.
There are many such differences.

Oh, I see. I really want to see Salburg Academy,
how about you, [px]?

Hey, why are you still chatting?
Don't you we are having a lesson now?

Marie! [px]! Extra special assignment for you!
You better reflect on yourselves!

Uh——Teachers are devils!! Boo-hoo,
In this regard, the two Academies are the same...

I don't want to piss here off anymore...
Let's do a good job, [px]... Sigh...
